statements: UPDATE user_access_history SET login_status = 'active' WHERE user_id = 12345
UPDATE user_access_history SET access_time = '2022-09-15 10:30:00', ip_address = '192.168.1.100' WHERE user_id = 54321
UPDATE user_access_history SET login_status = 'logged_in' WHERE user_id = 123 AND ip_address = '192.168.1.10';
UPDATE user_access_history SET access_time = '2022-01-20 12:30:45' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE user_access_history SET login_status = 'Successful' WHERE user_id = 101
UPDATE suspicious_login_patterns SET login_attempts = 3, last_login_attempt = '2022-08-25 15:30:00' WHERE user_id = 201
UPDATE user_access_history SET login_time = '2022-01-01 12:00:00', login_status = 'Successful' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE suspicious_login_patterns SET last_login_attempt = '2022-01-01 13:00:00', login_attempts = 5 WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE user_access_history SET location = 'New York' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE failed_login_attempts SET timestamp = '2022-01-15 10:30:00', ip_address = '192.168.1.100' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE user_access_history SET login_status = 'active' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE failed_login_attempts SET ip_address = '192.168.1.1' WHERE user_id = 'abcdef12-3456-7890-cdef-123456789abc';
UPDATE access_history SET login_status = 1 WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE user_agents SET user_agent_string = 'Mozilla Firefox' WHERE user_id = 54321;
UPDATE access_history SET login_status = TRUE WHERE user_id = 123 AND login_time = '2022-01-01T12:00:00'
UPDATE login_attempts SET login_time = '2022-01-02T10:30:00', login_attempt_status = 'FAILED' WHERE user_id = 456 AND login_ip = '192.168.1.100'
UPDATE user_table SET last_login = '2022-01-20 09:30:00' WHERE user_id = 123
UPDATE session_table SET end_time = '2022-01-20 12:45:00' WHERE session_id = 456
UPDATE user_table SET username='johndoe123', email='johndoe@example.com', last_login=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id=123;
UPDATE session_table SET end_time='2022-10-31 23:59:59', start_time='2022-10-01 00:00:00' WHERE user_id=456;
